transcript: and you know what if you just sell you can make money if you Market well you can make even more money and what happens for most entrepreneurs is they actually go in that direction they just learn how to sell because that's the easiest skill to learn you can learn it in a couple weeks learn how to Market takes a little longer you learn how to write copy it's really just translating the persuasion of sales into different types of media and selling to many people at once
